

```{r, BimodalFaithfulHistoChangeBins, fig.align="center", fig.width=6.25, fig.height=4.25, fig.cap="Histograms of the Old Faithful data; changing the bins can change the impression of the distribution. par( mfrow = c(2, 2))

hist(faithful$waiting,
     main  = "'Old Faithful'\nwaiting times",
     sub = "Sensible bins",
     xlab = "Waiting times (in mins)",
     ylab = "Frequency",
     xlim = c(40, 100),
     ylim = c(0, 60),
     las = 2,
     breaks = 12,
     axes = FALSE,
     col = plot.colour)
axis(side = 2, 
     las = 2)
axis(side = 1,
     cex = 0.9,
     las = 2,
     at = seq(40, 100, by = 20))
